dialogue.introduction: I'm Kasumi, charging forth. Follow me.
dialogue.library_intro: I fought intensely as a main fleet destroyer in history. In the end, I fought alongside battleship Yamato in Operation Ten-go against the fierce attacks of American carrier-based aircraft. I won't lose!
dialogue.secretary1: If you need me for something, look at me in the eyes!
dialogue.secretary2: Like I said, what is it? I hate badmouthing! I will only march on. (Kai Ni B)
dialogue.secretary3: Hah? Now you're angry at me for what you did? How undisciplined.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hey! Why are we on standby at such a crucial time?! What is the meaning of this? Are you listening?!
dialogue.secretarymarried: W-what? I'm actually grateful to you a little, if you weren't here I'd be lonelyâ€¦ D-don't get the wrong idea!
dialogue.wedding: Oh, for the garbage commander to be in a place like this, you must be quite free huh... eh... present? For me? Eh... Ah... you idiot...
dialogue.show_players_score: It's a letter. How many times are you going to make me say that, you garbage?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Kasumi, departing! I can't just stand by and watch. My thoughts are made. Now only action awaits! I'll do it! (Kai Ni B)
dialogue.equipment1: Something like this wouldn't even fall in the category of an upgrade.
dialogue.supply: What is it, resupply!? ...Well, it's necessary though.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Geez, what kind of order is this. It's really troublesome!
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairs have been completed. Verify it soon.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been completed. Go welcome her.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The operation has been completed. Listen to the report.
dialogue.night_battle: Argh, there's nobody else but idiots...
dialogue.night_attack: It would be great if you would just die!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: It would be great if you would just die!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: It would be great if you would just die!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: It would be great if you would just die!
dialogue.mvp: It's not like I'm happy or anything. But for now I'll accept your praise.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Kyaa! You've got to kidding me!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: It seems we have some half-decent opponents. I'll give you my praise. I won't sink from something like this! It's no joke, I tell you! (Kai Ni B)
dialogue.sunk: To think that I would sink... I won't... I won't accept this...!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn... And after autumn comes winter. Operation Rei-Go... Where I served as flagship... Why... do I remember it so vividly... Why?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas!? What's everyone getting all merry about, like idiots! Eh, cake!? I don't need something like that... Mm ... Ah...It's delicious! Wah... Umm...
dialogue.new_year_2016: Fuu. We were able to greet New Year safely. I'm glad. Shitty Commander-... Ah, I'm sorry... Commander, do take care of me this year as well. Wh-What is it!?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: I told you! Stop throwing beans at full power! It won't be long before demon Jintsuu... See! I-It's not my fault!
